archimate:BusinessRole.name: Record Keeper
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation:
Record Keeper is a mandatory fixed role in Crisis Management Team. Deputy must be nominated. Is proficient in Crisis Management Process and how to use the Crisis Management Tool in detail being a “heavy user” of the tool, acting also as a secretary in CMT meetings.
﻿Knows the escalation procedure from other processes, Major Incident Management and Security Incident Management.
Key authorities﻿﻿ Verifies that all needed templates and check lists are available for the Crisis Team meetings. Maintains logbook and recording all key communications using the Crisis Management Tool. ﻿ Key responsibilities Prepare situation report Performs preliminary severity evaluation. Creates documentation site (MS Teams site) for each crisis (use pre-defined folder structure and pre-defined naming convention to be used) Agrees the access rights to documentation sharing with the Crisis Manager. Launches the Crisis Management meeting templates, task lists, incident communications and documents needed during the crisis. Organizes and prepares the checklist and document templates to be used during the meetings. Documents the Minutes of Meeting during the first meeting. Sends invitations to recurring meetings. Documents the Minutes of Meeting during the recurring meetings. Collects the Decision's log Monitors the task list activities Collects statements and events relevant for the scenario management, resolution, and recoveries of business
